title: [QUICK-WIN] Replace console.log with proper logging service
body:
## Problem
132 files using console.log instead of the logging service.

## Tasks
- [ ] Create codemod script
- [ ] Run replacement
- [ ] Test changes
- [ ] Update linting rules

## Acceptance Criteria
- No console.log in codebase
- Logging service used
- Lint rule prevents regression

## Priority: LOW
## Effort: 3 story points
